title: 5 Quick Remedies for Typing Fatigue
description: Hands feeling heavy? Fingers stiff? Here are 5 quick ways to refresh your hands and get back to peak performance.
author: Free Online Typing Team
content:
1. Warm Water Soak

Increases blood flow and relaxes muscles.

2. Contrast Bath

Switch between hot and cold water to stimulate circulation.

3. Massage

Massage the forearm muscles, not just the wrist.

4. Shake It Out

Gently shake your hands to release tension.

5. Hydrate

Muscles need water to function properly.
